body:
I'm trying to install `pdt` from buildcache and I get this message:

```
patchelf: cannot find section '.dynamic'. The input file is most likely statically linked
==> Error: Command exited with status 1: '/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu18.04-x86_64/gcc-7.3.0/patchelf-0.10-jsttikjc3pizbwk5sa3rr7ywhacgboyy/bin/patchelf' '--print-rpath' '/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu18.04-x86_64/gcc-7.3.0/pdt-3.25.1-qn7v7q63nj4dxruluce7m2bqk4xatel2/x86_64/bin/taucpdisp'
```

Should there be some sort of check to prevent patchelf from trying to relocate static binaries?
title: patchelf trying to relocate static binaries when installing from buildcache
